comments_since_last_sample.body: I bought it, was super pumped for it. Sold it the same weekend. Biggest challenge in the game is getting the dipsh1t character to walk straight. Not worth my hype at all.
Death Stranding doesn't look like something I'd enjoy... but I'd rather give it a try for a few hours than pick up DOTA again.

The game has 92% positive reviews on Steam whether you like it or not.   
Just because the vocal minority doesn't like something doesn't mean its bad.
The people who hate it are the same ones who say “it doesn’t even have combat” and never actually played more than 10 minutes of the game.
It's like throwing that one country music album into your top 10 music albums just to fuck with people.
What's a shit game. Kojima did not respect my time whatsoever. Horse shit of a game.

I have the distinct feeling many people who dislike it didn’t play it.

And even if you don’t like it. Many others did.
Are you just learning people can like different things than you?
Weird how this offends people, that they actually have to make a post because they can't accept a game they hate, makes other people happy, so weird
I found it a really memorable experience.
They *have* to be paying for placement on lists. Nothing else explains it. Purely despise the game.
yeah idk walking simulator go brrrrrrrr
Imo Death Stranding is like the top 100 worst steam games to play. even hentai puzzles are better.
